Description:

Title: The unofficial yet comprehensive FAQ for LoongArch (last updated 2022-03-06)
Description:
Things you probably should know about the LoongArch, compiled and written by an independent developer.
Translated from the Chinese version with the addition of some helpful language and cultural background.

Title: Tear Down This Wall, Mr. BBC!
Description: When I opened my Overcast podcast app to listen to the latest episode of In Our Time, BBC Radio 4’s excellent show on the history of ideas, I was presented with this: Release dates matter. If…

Title: I Can No Longer Compile My First Flash Game
Description: A tale about game development and techonlogy obsolescence

Title: Escaping privileged containers for fun
Description: Despite the fact that it is not a 'real' vulnerability, escaping privileged Docker containers is nevertheless pretty funny. And because there will always be people who will come up with reasons or excuses to run a privileged container (even though you really shouldn't), this could really be handy at some point in the future

Title: What Makes Documentation Bad? | Arun Prasad
Description: Some thoughts on writing a lot of docs

Title: Building a generate routes function using Terraform test
Description:
Welcome to the next episode of thinking out loud to route in the cloud with style.
Earlier this season we abstracted a TGW Centralized Router.
Part of it’s responsibility is to manage routes between Tiered VPCs within a single region.
Looking forward, it would be nice to route between many TGW Centralized Routers but cross region with some kind of TGW Super Router abstraction.
I think it should roughly look like:

Title: You can Turn the Oven Down | Tom Gamon
Description: A lot of constraints are not that constraining after all.

Title: The rise of WebAssembly
Description: WASM initially promised performance gains and greater portability for web applications, but now is making an impact across a growing number of environments.
